text:
We have all heard of Salman Khan and his lavish parties in Mumbai. Whether it's Bigg Boss finales or his birthday party, the actor is known to throw fancy parties at the Panvel farmhouse.
And this time too, Salman brought in nephew's birthday in the farmhouse in the most luxurious way. Ahil, Arpita and Aayush Sharma's son turned 3 yesterday and was seen having a gala time with his friends.
Salman Khan also made the evening an unforgettable one. He was seen grooving with a life size Donald Duck and even flossing the dance move. Wearing denim shorts and shirt along with a cowboy hat, the 52-year-old looked hilarious and totally in character.

Everyone knows how much Salman loves kids and looking at his camaraderie with his nephew is adorable to another level. It just makes us wish that he should have children too.
Salman’s sister Arpita wished her little boy on Instagram with a cute picture and a lovely caption. She wrote, “Happiest 3rd Birthday my baby boy.. May you always be as amazing as you are. Keep spreading love & happiness always. I love you very much 😘”
Wishing you a Happy Birthday, Ahil and you are very lucky to have a mamu like Sallu bhai.
title: Salman Khan Shakes A Leg At Nephew Ahil's Birthday Party And It's A Hilarious Watch
